title: CM condoles loss of lives in road accident near Jhelum
content:
LAHORE, Oct 24 (APP): Punjab Chief Minister Sardar Usman Buzdar has expressed
a deep sense of sorrow and grief over the loss of precious
human lives in a traffic accident near Jhelum.
The chief minister expressed heartfelt sympathies and condolence
with the heirs of deceased, said a handout issued here on Saturday.
Usman Buzdar directed to provide best treatment facilities to the injuredand sought a report from the administration about the accident.
